ygData.subject: Pixie Strike oddity
ygData.msgSnippet: Was using Pixie in Karnors last weekend and noticed something really odd.  I ve always assumed the knockback component pushed the mob away from the Bard.
ygData.messageBody:
Was using Pixie in Karnors last weekend and noticed something really odd. I've always assumed the knockback component pushed the mob away from the Bard. Instead, it pushes it in the direction the Bard is facing (was very handy to learn 'cause we were in the tower, and it's easy to knock mobs off of it :). Does anyone know if the 53rd song does the same? Only 51 here, so it's gonna be a while before I can test it.

BTW, anyone ever climbed outside of Chardok? : ) http://www.clandlc.com/chardok.jpg Very easy to do with Song of Travel, and was a blast.

--Khelan, herding Bumble Bees on Tarew Marr
(http://www.clandlc.com/bee.jpg hehe)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
